title: So, what'd you get in 'Your Shop'?
body:
What'd you guys get? Share it here and show others what a lucky or unlucky guy you are.

http://imgur.com/a/zM6il

Guess I'm getting that Gangplank skin

replies.body:
http://imgur.com/a/PGMPO

Before this, I had wanted Snow Day Malzahar for ages. So I'm happy with this!

http://imgur.com/a/Pw2iY

Might get Kitty Kat Katarina so I can be a furry and third wheel Rakan and Xayah woo.

https://imgur.com/a/SZm84
Tell me what to buy guys!

You seem to play a lot of Lux so Spelltheif would definetely be worth it for you!

As a Talon main, I'll tell that you should get Blood Moon Talon. Its quite a good skin.

But thats just my opinion :3

http://imgur.com/UeNV5hP

Meowkai, Archduke Susan and Ser Kled (batteries included).

Now I just need some RP...
######*Hint hint, nudge nudge, wink wink*.

http://imgur.com/a/H9wLa

:D. Yes I did immediately buy Dark Star Varus and Warring Kingdoms Garen. They were both 60% off

http://imgur.com/a/sHWH2

Nothing too interesting, but far from terrible!

I am partial to Vikings however. And a Viking with a chef hat who lobs chunks of meat around... Well, how could I resist?

I like the Orianna skin, but whenever I play Ori I cant help but feel a little dirty. So I'm not sure if Ill get it.
You got a better discount on renegade than I did :(

Yea haha, ill probably pick it up.
Luckily it is a cheap skin anyway though :P

http://i.imgur.com/pXMHRp3.png

Sadly I got nothing good, was hoping for Vancouver Amumu or workshop Shaco

Mine is not good, RIP

http://i.imgur.com/FOcr7LM.png
I don't know... Personally I love Winter Wonder Orianna, and I got it in the last My Shop.

Got project yas, ssw talon, rengar, and nightstalker rengar for under 1000 i call win. And hey, technically it was free, won in that OPL tipping thing :P

https://imgur.com/a/rYBSS
Yep, SSW is a worth skin. It's my 2nd favourtite skin (after Blood Moon of course)
[A bunch of champs I already have 2+ skins for](https://imgur.com/a/QhmC3). I was really hoping for an Illaoi skin this round :3
